Submodules¶

groupbuilder.groupcalculator module¶

class groupbuilder.groupcalculator.GroupCalculator(amount_people: int, group_size: int)[source]¶

Bases: GroupCalculatorInterface

_abc_impl = <_abc._abc_data object>¶
can_repeat() → int[source]¶

Calculates the maximum number of unique groups that can be created. :return int: The maximum number of unique groups.

create_groups() → None[source]¶

Creates the groups, based on the round. Avoids usage of the same person in the same group. :return: None

get_all_groups(pyd: bool = False) → dict[source]¶

Gets all the groups. :return dict: All the groups.

get_current_groups(pyd: bool = False) → dict[source]¶

Gets the current groups. :return dict: The current groups.

reset_groups() → None[source]¶

Reset the groups and round to be initial. :return: None

select_csv_file(file_path: str) → dict[source]¶

Selects the students from a CSV file. :param file_path: The path to the CSV file. :return: The column indexes and column names to choose from.

select_from_csv_file(has_header_row: bool, student_firstname_col: int | str, student_lastname_col: int | str | None) → None[source]¶

Selects the students from a CSV file. :param has_header_row: If the CSV file has a header row. :param student_firstname_col: The column index or name of the student first name. :param student_lastname_col: The column index or name of the student last name. :return: None

visualize_groups() → None[source]¶

Print the groups in a readable format. :return: None
